snippet: The western region of Xinjiang has increased security measures at all 16 of its airports after a failed hijacking attempt.
abstract: Xinjiang, China, has increased security measures at all 16 of its airports after a failed hijacking attempt; ethnic Uighur exiles who criticize the Chinese government for repressing Uighurs in Xinjiang have said the story of the hijacking could be fictitious.
lead_paragraph: The western region of Xinjiang has increased security measures at all 16 of its airports after a failed hijacking attempt.
